# PM Toolkit

> Your docs. Your editor.

## Summary
PM Toolkit is a free, open-source Visual Studio Code and Cursor extension that provides a visual markdown editing experience. It includes a WYSIWYG editor, kanban boards, mermaid diagrams, document outline, image handling, templates, and file viewers â€” all backed by plain markdown files you own.

## Features
- WYSIWYG Markdown Editor built on React 18 with slash commands and bubble menu
- Block handles for drag-to-reorder any block
- Kanban boards backed by plain markdown files
- Image drop, resize, alignment, and captions
- Table controls with drag-to-reorder, context menus, and persisted column widths
- Mermaid diagram rendering with fit-to-view (flowcharts, sequence diagrams)
- Document outline with collapsible heading navigation
- Save guard that validates content before writing to disk
- Reusable templates with dynamic variables
- File viewers for PDF, Word, Excel, and CSV
- Keyboard shortcuts for all common formatting
- Light and dark theme support
